name: K-MB
tagline: Strategic Brand Consulting and Creative PR
description:
K-MB is a full-service, integrated communications agency with an office in Berlin.
They specialize in public and media relations, event marketing, digital marketing, and the creation of compelling original content. Â 
Services offered include market research, brand positioning, to-market strategies, content creation and production, event production, public and media relations, social media marketing, influencer relations, and a global creative network.
